content.prompt: The stone masonry at Machu Picchu employed socketing, a structural technique that

choices.label: guided water through retaining walls during torrential downpours
locked boulders of all shapes and sizes firmly in place
protected against damage caused by earthquakes
eliminated the need for traditional mortar

topic.text: 5.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
